20101231023502.000|20101231023503.000|CC1|>>> IN MISSISSIPPI TONIGHT, TWO 
20101231023503.000|20101231023504.000|CC1|SISTERS WHO WERE SENTENCED TO   
20101231023504.000|20101231023506.000|CC1|LIFE IN PRISON 16 YEARS AGO FOR 
20101231023506.000|20101231023507.000|CC1|A ROBBERY HAVE BEEN GRANTED     
20101231023507.000|20101231023509.000|CC1|CLEMENCY BY THE GOVERNOR UNDER  
20101231023509.000|20101231023510.000|CC1|AN UNUSUAL CONDITION.           
20101231023510.000|20101231023512.000|CC1|HERE'S OUR JUSTICE              
20101231023512.000|20101231023514.000|CC1|CORRESPONDENT, PETE WILLIAMS.   
20101231023514.000|20101231023517.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FOR 16 YEARS, TWO  
20101231023517.000|20101231023519.000|CC1|SISTERS, JAMIE AND GLADYS SCOTT,
20101231023519.000|20101231023521.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN IN A MISSISSIPPI      
20101231023521.000|20101231023524.000|CC1|PRISON, CONVICTED OF TAKING PART
20101231023524.000|20101231023526.000|CC1|IN AN ARMED ROBBERY IN 1993,    
20101231023526.000|20101231023528.000|CC1|EACH SERVING A LIFE SENTENCE,   
20101231023528.000|20101231023528.000|CC1|WHICH MANY CONSIDER UNUSUALLY   
20101231023528.000|20101231023529.000|CC1|HARSH.                          
20101231023529.000|20101231023531.000|CC1|NOW AFTER INTENSE LOBBYING FROM 
20101231023531.000|20101231023532.000|CC1|CIVIL RIGHTS GROUPS, GOVERNOR   
20101231023532.000|20101231023534.000|CC1|HALEY BARBOUR ORDERED THEIR     
20101231023534.000|20101231023536.000|CC1|RELEASE.                        
20101231023536.000|20101231023537.000|CC1|>> I'VE CRIED OUT TO GOD TO HELP
20101231023537.000|20101231023539.000|CC1|ME TO HELP MY GRANDCHILDREN AND 
20101231023539.000|20101231023540.000|CC1|TO KEEP JAMIE AND GLADYS SAFE   
20101231023540.000|20101231023542.000|CC1|INSIDE THAT PRISON.             
20101231023542.000|20101231023543.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE GOVERNOR DID   
20101231023543.000|20101231023545.000|CC1|NOT CALL THIS A QUESTION OF     
20101231023545.000|20101231023546.000|CC1|JUSTICE, INSTEAD HE SAID HE     
20101231023546.000|20101231023547.000|CC1|ACTED BECAUSE JAMIE SCOTT, WHO  
20101231023547.000|20101231023550.000|CC1|IS 38, NEEDS A KIDNEY TRANSPLANT
20101231023550.000|20101231023551.000|CC1|TO SURVIVE.                     
20101231023551.000|20101231023553.000|CC1|THE SISTERS NO LONGER POSE A    
20101231023553.000|20101231023555.000|CC1|THREAT TO SOCIETY, HE SAID, AND 
20101231023555.000|20101231023557.000|CC1|HER MEDICAL CONDITION CREATES A 
20101231023557.000|20101231023558.000|CC1|SUBSTANTIAL COST TO THE STATE,  
20101231023558.000|20101231023559.000|CC1|$200,000 A YEAR.                
20101231023559.000|20101231023600.000|CC1|BUT THE RELEASE OF GLADYS SCOTT 
20101231023600.000|20101231023602.000|CC1|WILL BE ALLOWED ONLY IF SHE     
20101231023602.000|20101231023604.000|CC1|DONATES ONE OF HER KIDNEYS TO   
20101231023604.000|20101231023605.000|CC1|HER SISTER, SOMETHING THE STATE 
20101231023605.000|20101231023607.000|CC1|SAYS WAS HER IDEA IN THE FIRST  
20101231023607.000|20101231023608.000|CC1|PLACE.                          
20101231023608.000|20101231023610.000|CC1|THE NAACP HAS LONG PROTESTED THE
20101231023610.000|20101231023611.000|CC1|SENTENCES AS EXTREME.           
20101231023611.000|20101231023615.000|CC1|NEITHER WOMAN HAD A CRIMINAL    
20101231023615.000|20101231023617.000|CC1|RECORD, THE VICTIMS WERE NOT    
20101231023617.000|20101231023618.000|CC1|SERIOUSLY HURT.                 
20101231023618.000|20101231023620.000|CC1|ONLY A FISTFUL OF DOLLARS WERE  
20101231023620.000|20101231023621.000|CC1|TAKEN AND OTHERS INVOLVED IN THE
20101231023621.000|20101231023622.000|CC1|ROBBERY HAVE LONG SINCE BEEN    
20101231023622.000|20101231023624.000|CC1|RELEASED.                       
20101231023624.000|20101231023626.000|CC1|THE GOVERNOR'S ACTION BROUGHT   
20101231023626.000|20101231023627.000|CC1|STRONG PRAISE TODAY.            
20101231023627.000|20101231023629.000|CC1|>> OUR APPRECIATION IS THE FACT 
20101231023629.000|20101231023631.000|CC1|THAT THEY ARE NOW GOING TO BE   
20101231023631.000|20101231023633.000|CC1|ABLE TO GO HOME, SPEND TIME WITH
20101231023633.000|20101231023635.000|CC1|THEIR CHILDREN, HAVE A BETTER   
20101231023635.000|20101231023636.000|CC1|QUALITY OF LIFE, AND HOPEFULLY  
20101231023636.000|20101231023638.000|CC1|GET THE MEDICAL ATTENTION THAT  
20101231023638.000|20101231023639.000|CC1|THEY WELL DESERVE.              
20101231023639.000|20101231023640.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HALEY BARBOUR MADE 
20101231023640.000|20101231023643.000|CC1|NO SECRET OF HIS INTEREST IN    
20101231023643.000|20101231023644.000|CC1|POSSIBLY RUNNING FOR PRESIDENT  
20101231023644.000|20101231023647.000|CC1|IN TWO YEARS, THOUGH HE FIRST   
20101231023647.000|20101231023648.000|CC1|WENT TO THE PAROLE BOARD IN     
20101231023648.000|20101231023649.000|CC1|AUGUST, SOME IN MISSISSIPPI SAY

20101231024627.000|20101231024629.000|CC1|MISUNDERSTOOD.                  
20101231024629.000|20101231024631.000|CC1|BUT OTHER EXPERTS SAY           
20101231024631.000|20101231024632.000|CC1|WITHHOLDING THESE REPORTS       
20101231024632.000|20101231024634.000|CC1|ENABLES CLINICS TO HIDE POOR    
20101231024634.000|20101231024635.000|CC1|PERFORMANCE.                    
20101231024635.000|20101231024637.000|CC1|>> HAVING THE INFORMATION MORE  
20101231024637.000|20101231024639.000|CC1|AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC WILL    
20101231024639.000|20101231024641.000|CC1|MAKE THE DIALYSIS FACILITIES    
20101231024641.000|20101231024642.000|CC1|MUCH MORE ACCOUNTABLE.          
20101231024642.000|20101231024643.000|CC1|>> THIS IS WITH MY SON.         
20101231024643.000|20101231024645.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BARBARA SCOTT'S    
20101231024645.000|20101231024650.000|CC1|FAMILY SUED AND SETTLED.        
20101231024650.000|20101231024653.000|CC1|IN A STATEMENT, THE COMPANY SAID
20101231024653.000|20101231024655.000|CC1|"HUMAN ERRORS CAN HAPPEN, BUT WE
20101231024655.000|20101231024657.000|CC1|WORK DILIGENTLY TO AVOID THIS   
20101231024657.000|20101231024658.000|CC1|AND TO IMPROVE QUALITY."        
20101231024658.000|20101231024659.000|CC1|STRAUB SAYS THE GOVERNMENT WILL 
20101231024659.000|20101231024701.000|CC1|MAKE MORE COMPREHENSIVE DATA    
20101231024701.000|20101231024704.000|CC1|AVAILABLE IN THE FUTURE.        
20101231024704.000|20101231024705.000|CC1|INFORMATION CATHY SHARKEY SAYS  
20101231024705.000|20101231024706.000|CC1|MIGHT HAVE MADE A DIFFERENCE FOR
20101231024706.000|20101231024708.000|CC1|HER MOTHER.
